CodeList.Name: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 3 Months Version Test Name

Description.TranslatedText: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 3 Months Version test name.

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 3 Months Version - These are questions about other effects that your respiratory problems may have on you these days: I get afraid or panic when I cannot catch my breath.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: SGRQ Past 3 Months Version - Get Afraid When Cannot Catch My Breath

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 3 Months Version - We would like to know how your respiratory problems usually affect your daily life: I cannot go out for entertainment or recreation.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: SGRQ Past 3 Months Version - Cannot Go Out for Entertainment

EnumeratedItem.CodedValue: SGRQ01-Cannot Go Out to Do Shopping
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: SGRQ01-Cannot Go Out to Do Shopping
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 3 Months Version - We would like to know how your respiratory problems usually affect your daily life: I cannot go out of the house to do the shopping.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: SGRQ Past 3 Months Version - Cannot Go Out to Do Shopping

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 3 Months Version - These are questions about other effects that your respiratory problems may have on you these days: My cough or breathing is embarrassing in public.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: SGRQ Past 3 Months Version - My Cough is Embarrassing in Public

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 3 Months Version - These are more questions about your cough and shortness of breath these days: My coughing or breathing disturbs my sleep.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: SGRQ Past 3 Months Version - Coughing Disturbs My Sleep

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 3 Months Version - These are more questions about your cough and shortness of breath these days: Coughing hurts.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: SGRQ Past 3 Months Version - Coughing Hurts

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 3 Months Version - These are more questions about your cough and shortness of breath these days: Coughing makes me tired.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: SGRQ Past 3 Months Version - Coughing Makes Me Tired

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 3 Months Version - Please check one box to show how you describe your current health.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: SGRQ Past 3 Months Version - Describe Your Current Health

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 3 Months Version - How would you describe your respiratory condition?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: SGRQ Past 3 Months Version - Describe Your Respiratory Condition

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 3 Months Version - These are questions about how your activities might be affected by your respiratory problems: My breathing makes it difficult to do things such as carry heavy loads, dig in the garden or shovel snow, jog or walk briskly (5 miles per hour), play tennis or swim.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: SGRQ Past 3 Months Version - Breathing Makes Difficult to Carry Heavy Loads

EnumeratedItem.CodedValue: SGRQ01-Difficult to Do Very Heavy Work
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: SGRQ01-Difficult to Do Very Heavy Work
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 3 Months Version - These are questions about how your activities might be affected by your respiratory problems: My breathing makes it difficult to do things such as very heavy manual work, ride a bike, run, swim fast, or play competitive sports.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: SGRQ Past 3 Months Version - Breathing Makes Difficult to Do Heavy Manual Work

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 3 Months Version - These are questions about how your activities might be affected by your respiratory problems: My breathing makes it difficult to do things such as walk up hills, carry things up stairs, light gardening such as weeding, dance, bowl or play golf.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: SGRQ Past 3 Months Version - Breathing Makes Difficult to Walk Up Hills

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 3 Months Version - These are questions about your respiratory treatment: I get embarrassed using my medication in public.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: SGRQ Past 3 Months Version - Embarrassed Using Medication in Public

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 3 Months Version - These are questions about other effects that your respiratory problems may have on you these days: Everything seems too much of an effort.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: SGRQ Past 3 Months Version - Everything Too Much Effort

EnumeratedItem.CodedValue: SGRQ01-Exercise Is Not Safe for Me
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: SGRQ01-Exercise Is Not Safe for Me
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 3 Months Version - These are questions about other effects that your respiratory problems may have on you these days: Exercise is not safe for me.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: SGRQ Past 3 Months Version - Exercise Is Not Safe for Me

EnumeratedItem.CodedValue: SGRQ01-How Long Worst Resp Attack Last
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: SGRQ01-How Long Worst Resp Attack Last
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 3 Months Version - How long did the worst respiratory attack last?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: SGRQ Past 3 Months Version - How Long Did Worst Respiratory Attack Last

EnumeratedItem.CodedValue: SGRQ01-How Many Good Days Have You Had
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: SGRQ01-How Many Good Days Have You Had
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 3 Months Version - Over the past 3 months, in a typical week, how many good days (with few respiratory problems) have you had?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: SGRQ Past 3 Months Version - How Many Good Days You Had

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 3 Months Version - Best describe how your respiratory problems affect you.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: SGRQ Past 3 Months Version - How Respiratory Problems Affect You

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 3 Months Version - We would like to know how your respiratory problems usually affect your daily life: I cannot do household chores.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: SGRQ Past 3 Months Version - Cannot Do Household Chores

EnumeratedItem.CodedValue: SGRQ01-I Cannot Move Far From My Bed
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: SGRQ01-I Cannot Move Far From My Bed
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 3 Months Version - We would like to know how your respiratory problems usually affect your daily life: I cannot move far from my bed or chair.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: SGRQ Past 3 Months Version - Cannot Move Far From Bed or Chair

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 3 Months Version - We would like to know how your respiratory problems usually affect your daily life: I cannot play sports or do other physical activities.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: SGRQ Past 3 Months Version - Cannot Play Sports or Do Physical Activities

EnumeratedItem.CodedValue: SGRQ01-I Cannot Take a Bath or Shower
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: SGRQ01-I Cannot Take a Bath or Shower
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 3 Months Version - These are questions about how your activities might be affected by your respiratory problems: I cannot take a bath or shower, or I take a long time to do it.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: SGRQ Past 3 Months Version - Cannot Take a Bath or Shower

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 3 Months Version - These are more questions about your cough and shortness of breath these days: I get exhausted easily.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: SGRQ Past 3 Months Version - I Get Exhausted Easily

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 3 Months Version - These are questions about other effects that your respiratory problems may have on you these days: I have become frail or an invalid because of my respiratory problems.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: SGRQ Past 3 Months Version - Become Frail or Invalid Because of My Respiratory Problems

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 3 Months Version - Over the past 3 months, I have brought up phlegm (sputum).
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: SGRQ Past 3 Months Version - I Have Brought Up Phlegm

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 3 Months Version - Over the past 3 months, I have coughed.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: SGRQ Past 3 Months Version - I Have Coughed

EnumeratedItem.CodedValue: SGRQ01-I Have Had Shortness of Breath
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: SGRQ01-I Have Had Shortness of Breath
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 3 Months Version - Over the past 3 months, I have had shortness of breath.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: SGRQ Past 3 Months Version - I Have Had Shortness of Breath

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 3 Months Version - Over the past 3 months, I have had wheezing attacks.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: SGRQ Past 3 Months Version - I Have Had Wheezing Attacks

EnumeratedItem.CodedValue: SGRQ01-I Walk Slower Than Other People
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: SGRQ01-I Walk Slower Than Other People
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 3 Months Version - These are questions about how your activities might be affected by your respiratory problems: I walk slower than other people my age, or I stop to rest.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: SGRQ Past 3 Months Version - Walk Slower Than Other People My Age

EnumeratedItem.CodedValue: SGRQ01-If I Hurry, I Have to Stop
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: SGRQ01-If I Hurry, I Have to Stop
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 3 Months Version - These are questions about how your activities might be affected by your respiratory problems: If I hurry or walk fast, I have to stop or slow down.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: SGRQ Past 3 Months Version - If Walk Fast I Have to Stop or Slow Down

EnumeratedItem.CodedValue: SGRQ01-If You Have Ever Held a job
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: SGRQ01-If You Have Ever Held a job
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 3 Months Version - If you have ever held a job.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: SGRQ Past 3 Months Version - Held a Job

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 3 Months Version - These are questions about how your activities might be affected by your respiratory problems: Jobs such as household chores take a long time, or I have to stop to rest.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: SGRQ Past 3 Months Version - Jobs Take Long Time or I Have to Stop

EnumeratedItem.CodedValue: SGRQ01-Not Expect Probs to Get Better
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: SGRQ01-Not Expect Probs to Get Better
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 3 Months Version - These are questions about other effects that your respiratory problems may have on you these days: I do not expect my respiratory problems to get any better.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: SGRQ Past 3 Months Version - Not Expect Respiratory Problems Get Better

EnumeratedItem.CodedValue: SGRQ01-Not in Control of Resp Problems
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: SGRQ01-Not in Control of Resp Problems
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 3 Months Version - These are questions about other effects that your respiratory problems may have on you these days: I feel that I am not in control of my respiratory problems.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: SGRQ Past 3 Months Version - Not in Control of My Respiratory Problems

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 3 Months Version - These are questions about what activities usually make you feel short of breath these days: Playing sports or other physical activities.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: SGRQ Past 3 Months Version - Playing Sports or Other Physical Activities

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 3 Months Version - These are questions about other effects that your respiratory problems may have on you these days: My respiratory problems are a nuisance to my family, friends or neighbors.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: SGRQ Past 3 Months Version - Respiratory Problems a Nuisance to Family

EnumeratedItem.CodedValue: SGRQ01-Short of Breath When Bend Over
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: SGRQ01-Short of Breath When Bend Over
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 3 Months Version - These are more questions about your cough and shortness of breath these days: I am short of breath when I bend over.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: SGRQ Past 3 Months Version - Short of Breath When Bend Over

EnumeratedItem.CodedValue: SGRQ01-Short of Breath When I Talk
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: SGRQ01-Short of Breath When I Talk
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 3 Months Version - These are more questions about your cough and shortness of breath these days: I am short of breath when I talk.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: SGRQ Past 3 Months Version - Short of Breath When I Talk

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 3 Months Version - These are questions about what activities usually make you feel short of breath these days: Sitting or lying still.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: SGRQ Past 3 Months Version - Sitting or Lying Still

EnumeratedItem.CodedValue: SGRQ01-Take a Long Time to Get Washed
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: SGRQ01-Take a Long Time to Get Washed
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 3 Months Version - These are questions about how your activities might be affected by your respiratory problems: I take a long time to get washed or dressed.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: SGRQ Past 3 Months Version - Take Long Time to Get Washed or Dressed

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 3 Months Version - How many times during the past 3 months have you suffered from severe or very unpleasant respiratory attacks?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: SGRQ Past 3 Months Version - Times Suffered From Severe Respiratory Attacks

EnumeratedItem.CodedValue: SGRQ01-Treatment Does Not Help Me Much
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: SGRQ01-Treatment Does Not Help Me Much
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 3 Months Version - These are questions about your respiratory treatment: My treatment does not help me very much.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: SGRQ Past 3 Months Version - Treatment Does Not Help Me Much

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 3 Months Version - These are questions about your respiratory treatment: My treatment interferes with my life a lot.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: SGRQ Past 3 Months Version - Treatment Interferes With My Life

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 3 Months Version - These are questions about your respiratory treatment: I have unpleasant side effects from my medication.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: SGRQ Past 3 Months Version - Unpleasant Side Effects From Medication

EnumeratedItem.CodedValue: SGRQ01-Walk Up Flight of Stairs Slowly
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: SGRQ01-Walk Up Flight of Stairs Slowly
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 3 Months Version - These are questions about how your activities might be affected by your respiratory problems: If I walk up one flight of stairs, I have to go slowly or stop.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: SGRQ Past 3 Months Version - If Walk Up One Flight of Stairs I Have to Go Slow

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 3 Months Version - These are questions about what activities usually make you feel short of breath these days: Walking around the house.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: SGRQ Past 3 Months Version - Walking Around the House

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 3 Months Version - These are questions about what activities usually make you feel short of breath these days: Walking outside on level ground.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: SGRQ Past 3 Months Version - Walking Outside on Level Ground

EnumeratedItem.CodedValue: SGRQ01-Walking Up a Flight of Stairs
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: SGRQ01-Walking Up a Flight of Stairs
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 3 Months Version - These are questions about what activities usually make you feel short of breath these days: Walking up a flight of stairs.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: SGRQ Past 3 Months Version - Walking Up a Flight of Stairs

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 3 Months Version - These are questions about what activities usually make you feel short of breath these days: Walking up hills.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: SGRQ Past 3 Months Version - Walking Up Hills

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 3 Months Version - These are questions about what activities usually make you feel short of breath these days: Washing or dressing yourself.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: SGRQ Past 3 Months Version - Washing or Dressing Yourself

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire Past 3 Months Version - If you wheeze, is it worse when you get up in the morning?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: SGRQ Past 3 Months Version - Wheeze Worse When Get Up in the Morning
